channel.title: Programmming on Jeff Smith
channel.link:
http://localhost:3000/categories/programmming/Recent content in Programmming on Jeff SmithHugo -- gohugo.ioen-usMon, 03 Jul 2017 00:00:00 +0000
Setup bitbucket hg project with new keyhttp://localhost:3000/notes/setup-bitbucket-project-hg-with-new-key/Mon, 03 Jul 2017 00:00:00 +0000http://localhost:3000/notes/setup-bitbucket-project-hg-with-new-key/Not exact steps but basically… CREATE AND USE NEW SSL KEY ssh-keygen -f ~/.ssh/tallymywork -C "tallymywork" Edit the ~/.ssh/config file. Host tallymywork HostName bitbucket.org User hg IdentityFile ~/.ssh/tallymywork pbcopy < ~/.ssh/tallymywork.pub ssh-add ~/.ssh/tallymywork ssh-add -l UPDATE .hgrc ssh://hg@tallymywork/tallymywork/tallymywork.bitbucket.org CLONE BLANK PROJECT hg clone ssh://hg@thoughtlogix/thoughtlogix/tallymywork
Basic HTTP benchmarking and stress testinghttp://localhost:3000/notes/basic-http-benchmarking-and-stress-testing/Fri, 18 Nov 2016 00:00:00 +0000http://localhost:3000/notes/basic-http-benchmarking-and-stress-testing/WRK wrk -c100 -t12 -d10s http://127.0.0.1:3000/ AB ab -c 100 -n 1000 http://127.0.0.1:3000/
Qt get screen size and set window locationhttp://localhost:3000/notes/qt-get-screen-size-and-set-window-location/Mon, 06 Jun 2016 00:00:00 +0000http://localhost:3000/notes/qt-get-screen-size-and-set-window-location/WidgetMainWindow w; QRect rec = QApplication::desktop()->screenGeometry(); int height = rec.height(); int width = rec.width(); w.setGeometry(width - 450, 10, 450, 700); w.show();
SQL Server run sql file from command linehttp://localhost:3000/notes/sql-server-run-sql-from-command-line/Fri, 19 Jun 2015 00:00:00 +0000http://localhost:3000/notes/sql-server-run-sql-from-command-line/sqlcmd -s localhost\instancce -d fatttydb -i fatty_1_schema_no_constraints.sql
Basic curl rest testinghttp://localhost:3000/notes/basic-curl-rest-testing/Wed, 19 Nov 2014 00:00:00 +0000http://localhost:3000/notes/basic-curl-rest-testing/curl -X DELETE http://localhost:12000/samples/1 curl -H "Content-Type: application/json" -d '{"name”:"sample-name","notes”:"sample-notes"}' http://localhost:12000/samples/ url -X PUT -H "Content-Type: application/json" -d '{"id": "2","name":"sample-name33333333","notes":"sample-notes"}' http://localhost:12000/api/samples/
